Nigeria Info bụ netwọk nke ụlọ ọrụ redio na-ekwu okwu na Naịjirịa, na-agbasa ozi na 99.3 MHz na Lagos, 95.1 MHz na Abuja, na 92.3 MHz na Port Harcourt
N'ịbụ nke Info FM Nigeria Limited, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-agbasa akụkọ obodo na nke mba ụwa na ngwakọta nke okwu na egwuregwu, ka ọ na-ekwu maka ihe ndị na-eme ugbu a na nsogbu ndị dị na Naịjirịa
Nigeria Info malitere na Lagos n'afọ 2011 na Abuja na 30 Nọvemba afọ 2012
N'oge gara aga, netwọk ahụ gosipụtara ihe ngosi awa ise n'ụbọchị izu nke Adenike Oyetunde kwadoro.
N'afọ 2021, ụlọ ọrụ Abuja, nke Femi D Amele na-elekọta, natara onyinye Press Freedom Award site na Nigeria Union of Journalists.
N'afọ 2020, National Broadcasting Commission kwụrụ ụlọ ọrụ Nigeria Info's Lagos ụgwọ nde naira ise maka nkwupụta e mere n'otu n'ime mmemme ya nke a weere na ọ bụ okwu ịkpọasị.
